snippet.title: Make a Good Mega Man Level 3 - RELEASED!
snippet.description:
GET THE GAME: http://www.magmmlcontest.com/magmml3.php
JOIN THE DISCORD: https://discord.gg/7H2mXSPM5p
 
Back in 2018, the third Make a Good Mega Man Level Contest was held, and nearly 200 entries were submitted by level designers from all walks of life. Newcomers, veterans, young and old put their hearts into hundreds of unique experiences, all seeking to share their ideal of a "Mega Man level" with the world.
 
Now, in 2024, the 6th Worldwide Sponsored Robot Tournament has begun. Compiling all of the levels originally submitted, ranked by a team of five judges from worst to best and laid out across fifteen Tiers, Mega Man must challenge not just the entries, but fellow competitors all seeking to prove themselves. 
 
Clear the entries. Beat the Tier Bosses. Earn the Ranks. Seize victory.  
 
But there is more than meets the eye. The tournament has become a lightning-rod, drawing in a swirling storm of dreams and ambitions with a paradise in its center. 
 
Burning passions. Dubious sponsors. Grudgeful challengers. Unlikely allies. Dark conspiracies... 
 
Secrets, upgrades, room decorations, battles, and more battles....
 
In Make a Good Mega Man Level 3, you'll witness a hurricane of blazing ambitions from beginning to end. A massive love letter to the Mega Man community, and the people who make it up. Hours upon hours of lovingly crafted content from both entrants and contest staff alike await. You can play Solitaire. 
 
READY?
 
Let the tournament begin. 
 
MaGMML TWITTER LINK: https://twitter.com/MaGMMLC
TRAILER DIRECTOR: https://twitter.com/TheSketchyMan
TRAILER MUSIC COMPOSER: https://www.youtube.com/@DarksTunes
